abstract: The following tax-exempt fixed-income issues are scheduled for pricing this week.
snippet: The following tax-exempt fixed-income issues are scheduled for pricing this week.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury’s schedule of financing this week includes Monday’s regular weekly auction of new three- and six-month bills and an auction of four-week bills on Wednesday. Bond markets will close early on Monday at 2 p.m. and will be closed on Tuesday in observance of Christmas Day.

headline.main: Treasury Auctions Set for This Week
headline.print_headline: Treasury Auctions Set for This Week
